0: My father was a great man
8:
- How are your parents?
- They will feel better to be avenged
9:
- Did you Know Sir? Then.
- Did I know that I just met the most dangerous dark wizard of all time? No. If I did...
10: "The one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches... born to those who have thrice defied him, born as the seventh month dies... and the Dark Lord will mark him as his equal, but he will have power the Dark Lord knows not... and either must die at the hand of the other for neither can live while the other survives... the one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord will be born as the seventh month dies...."
11: Nothing like a nighttime stroll to give you ideas
12:
- Lily... after all this time?
- ALWAYS
13:
There is no good and evil
There is only power
And those too weak to seek it
20: You don't know anything about me
